inputs.text: Eye-level, 50 mm lens: the exact two individuals from the input image—unaltered faces, hairstyles, body proportions, clothing colors and textures—sit face-to-face across a small round café table; soft natural window light from the left replicates the original lighting direction; table surface is light-oak with a faint reflection of their coffee cups; background shows a gently blurred interior—exposed brick wall, pendant Edison bulbs, quiet patrons in bokeh; steam rises from fresh lattes, a half-eaten croissant on a slate plate between them.
